name: Entropy (itch) (Fartychicken)
description: Discover the secrets of a strange time loop and try to escape it. This game is horribly unfinished and I don't actually know if its completable but it's kinda fun to walk around and talk to the NPC's. The game doesn't loop properly (It's supposed to reset every 5 -7 mins) so just press esc and the game ends. restart and BAM, loop. Spam E on doors  or NPC's and it'll probably do something. I mismanaged my time horribly but I learned stuff and had fun that's all that matters in the end.
